Description: Limestone cylinder jar: with very slightly concave sides and a projecting rim. Interior fairly well hollowed. Of irregular workmanship. The outer surface of the jar has been darkened by fire.
Curator's comments: For information on tomb 3504, see W. B. Emery, 'Great tombs of the First Dynasty; excavations at Sakkara' II' (London, 1954), 5ff.
